text: Must possess exceptional written and verbal communication skills to present complex technical roadmaps to executive leadership.

extractions.extraction_text: Present technical roadmaps to executive leadership

text: Ability to lead and mentor a distributed team of engineers, fostering a culture of ownership and high performance.

extractions.extraction_text: Lead and mentor a distributed team

text: Required to analyze user feedback and performance metrics to diagnose and resolve application bottlenecks and design long-term solutions.

extractions.extraction_text: Analyze metrics to diagnose and resolve bottlenecks

text: Collaborate daily with Product, Design, and QA teams in an Agile environment to align feature development and delivery schedules.

extractions.extraction_text: Collaborate daily with cross-functional teams in Agile

text: Demonstrated ability to pivot quickly and adjust strategy in response to changing market conditions and unforeseen regulatory challenges.

extractions.extraction_text: Pivot strategy in response to changing conditions
